ovdesc.p: This application updates a file called SEC.TRANSFER.AMEND This file gets updated whenever there is a change in PRICE field of SECURITY.TRANSFER record after authorisation. This file will be used in the End Of Day to produce a report detailing all the SECURITY.TRANSFER price changes made that day.

desc.p: Unique reference which identifies the transaction.

Only the sequence number (nnnnn) is required to be input. The Application will automatically generate the prefix (SECTSC) and the first 5 digits (yyddd) and attach the sequence number. The sequence number may be either User or System generated.

10 Numeric characters, prefixed by SECTSC, ie. SECTSCyydddnnnnn. yy = year (eg. 85 = 1985), ddd = julian day (ie. 01/jan = 001, 02/Jan = 002, 01/Feb = 032, etc.), nnnnn = transaction sequence number (in the range, 00001 to 99999.). (Mandatory input)
The sequence number (nnnnn) must be unique.
